cleaned_text: Wellness Labs Herbal Spotlight: Honey Honey has been used for centuries for its medicinal properties and health benefits. With its natural sweetness and versatility, it's a popular ingredient in food, beverages, and natural remedies. Local honey can offer several benefits for allergies. By consuming local honey, you are exposing yourself to small amounts of the same pollen that causes your allergies. Over time, this exposure can help your body build up immunity to the pollen, reducing your allergic response. Additionally, the antimicrobial and anti-inflammatory properties of honey can help soothe irritated nasal passages and reduce allergy symptoms.
